title: Fill missing commit hashes for 82 font families
description: 82 font families have upstream repos identified but are missing the original onboarding commit hash. Need to investigate binary file history in google/fonts, analyze commit messages, and trace linked PRs to identify the exact commits used for onboarding.

title: Resolve pending questions with font designers/engineers
description: 7 pending questions in data/pending_questions.json need answers from specific people: fontc_crater maintainers (Markazi Text commit mismatch), Borna Izadpanah (Markazi Text Arabic fix), Alexei Vanyashin (Lora version), Marc Foley (Fira Sans commit), Google Fonts team (14 private repos, 28 broken URLs).

title: Fill missing config_yaml for 44 font families
description: 44 font families have upstream repos but are missing config_yaml paths. Need to check upstream repos for config.yaml files or create override config.yaml files in google/fonts family directories. Similar to the batch 5 effort (PR #10248).

title: Discover upstream repos for 557 'no source' font families
description: 557 font families (28.6%) in gfonts_library_sources.json have no upstream repository URL identified. These need investigation via PR history, commit messages, designer profiles, and GitHub searches to find their source repos. This is the single largest gap in fontc_crater target coverage.
notes: Closed: All 557 no_source families resolved. 503 matched to upstream repos, 54 confirmed as no_upstream_repo. no_source count: 557 → 0.

title: Submit and land pending draft PRs
description: 8 PRs tracked in data/pending_prs.json. 4 are submitted (designer bios PRs #10164, #10166, #10167, #10168), 1 submitted (config_yaml batch 5 #10248), 3 are draft (Fira Sans commit, Amaranth commit, Archivoblack commit, Amiko commit). Draft PRs need finalization and submission.

title: Fix 28 broken repository URLs
description: 28 font families have repository_url fields pointing to deleted or moved repos (HTTP 404). Primarily nicholasjohnson/* (23 fonts) and bghryct/* repos. Need to find where these repos moved or identify replacement sources. Tracked in data/pending_questions.json (q7).

comments.author: Felipe Correa da Silva Sanches
comments.text: PR #10266 submitted to google/fonts fixing 6 broken URLs: Red Hat Display/Mono/Text (bghryct→RedHatOfficial), Manrope (sharanda→aaronbell), Orelega One (JapanYoshi→haleyhalcyon/GitLab), Elsie (removed invalid URL). Syne URL was actually alive (200). Original q7 count of 28 was from cached data; most were already fixed or never had repository_url set. Investigation reports written to data/investigations/.

title: Address 17 fontc_crater discovery failures
description: 17 upstream repos fail fontc_crater target discovery. Root causes: 6 need pre-build scripts, 3 have path resolution bugs, 4 have stale cache/wrong branch, 2 have incompatible build systems, 1 stale crater result, 1 inline recipe. Documented in data/fontc_crater_failures.json with fix strategies per category.

title: Resolve 134 'incomplete source' font families
description: 134 font families (6.9%) have status 'incomplete_source' in gfonts_library_sources.json. These have partial metadata but need additional fields filled in (some combination of repository_url, commit_hash, or config_yaml).
